title: Foolish.Wives.Stroheim.1922.BRRip.new.soundtrack
description:
Foolish Wives (Eric von Stroheim - 1922)


From the 2013 Kino Classics release, mastered in HD from archival 35mm print of the 1972 AFI Arthur Lenning restoration. 
with a new, unprecedented music soundtrack *

in 2 parts


BD Rip
Format: AVI (Generic MPEG-4)
Codec: XVID
Resolution: 952x720
Frame rate: 24
Data size: Part 1: 1.79 GB
	   Part 2: 1.90 GB
Data rate: 3757.22 / 3734.78 kbits/s
Audio: Stereo, 48.000 kHz
Duration:  Part 1: 01:09:39
	   Part 2: 01:15:13

English intertitles
Subtitles: Spanish (srt)

-------------------------------

* ABOUT THIS NEW SOUNDTRACK:

As an alternative to the recorded original score (by Sigmund Romberg) included in the Kino blu-ray release, this unprecedented music soundtrack features a variety of music, most of which we trust von Stroheim loved, even mentioned in some of the scenes.

Read more here: <a href="
https://sites.google.com/site/jolonquessoundtracks/foolish-wives" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://sites.google.com/site/jolonquessoundtracks/foolish-wives</a>

__________________________________

"One of the greatest directors in the history of cinema, Stroheim was fated, largely by his own inability to compromise his art for commercial ends, to achieve only a very small output, and to see five of the nine films he made as director 'improved' by other hands." - David Robinson (The Internatinal Encyclopedia of Film, 1972)
